    public class Slide
extends java.lang.Object
implements ISceneTransition
    A scene transition that slides scenes

    • Method Detail

      • init

        public static Slide init(float duration,
                         int direction,
                         boolean slideOut,
                         com.badlogic.gdx.math.Interpolation easing)
        Creates a new instance given a duration, direction, number of slices and an interpolation
        Parameters:
        duration - the duration of the transition in seconds
        direction - the direction of the transition. Must be one of TransitionDirection.LEFT, TransitionDirection.RIGHT, TransitionDirection.UP, TransitionDirection.DOWN
        slideOut - if true, the current scene will slide out else the current scene will slide in. The slided out scene will be at the top
        easing - an interpolation to use.
        Returns:
        the created instance

      • getDuration

        public float getDuration()
        Specified by:
        getDuration in interface ISceneTransition
        Returns:
        the duration (in seconds) this transition will take

      • render

        public void render(com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.g2d.SpriteBatch batch,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture currScreen,
                   com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Texture nextScreen,
                   float alpha)
        Description copied from interface: ISceneTransition
        Renders the current state of the transition.
        Specified by:
        render in interface ISceneTransition
        Parameters:
        batch - a sprite batch for rendering
        currScreen - the current scene
        nextScreen - the next scene
        alpha - the progress of the transition in a range of [0, 1]
